fields.title: Harris 1992 Business Week National Issues Survey, study no. 921206

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey focuses on many issues of national interest, including voting intentions, 1992 Presidential election, rating of President Bush, candidates and vision for the future, rating of America's public schools, problems in schools, pay for teachers, casino gambling, football, charitable giving, UNICEF, and health care.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: RDD national telephone survey of 18 year olds living in the United States.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-921206;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
